TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

I PM'd Sal_Vager a few weeks ago with the idea of creating a topic called "Tea Time with Squad" where users could talk casually with devs/mods/eachother about life and things that would simply clog Off-Topic. Is this thread at all related to that PM? I do know Sal seemed to be interested.
Its more a general off topic thread which has been done 2 times before and this is the third. Look at the first post for the first two threads.
